I CUT MY HAIR!!!

hey y'all i got bored on monday and decided i needed a hair cut...so yea i took about four inches off and it actually looks good...a little differ than the pic i have up but yea later
love and hugs,
Skacie Kay
Shelle

R.I.P Amanada!!!!

ok well just so you know, on May 12, one of my best friends died from a biking accident....She was only 17 and she had given birth to a beautiful baby girl back in January....She will be missed by many. Wish you were still here Amanda Lee Porter! Love you Forever
Shelle

What I Want in a Guy

OK my brother-in-law, Doug, told me to start thinking about what I want in a guy, so I decided to write this. Here goes....

I want him to be honest with me. He needs to be sweet and caring. He should at least like kids since I love spending time with my nieces. He should love me unconditionally. He needs to be a decent guy, that has a job and has plans for a future. I want him to be taller than me. He needs to take care of himself. He should have no problem admitting when he is wrong and if he has a problem admitting it then that is ok. I want him to be willing to hold me when I am scared or anytime I am sad about something. I don't want to be his trophy wife, but he should want to show me off to his friends. He needs to be a guy that always does the right thing even if it is hard for him. I may seem to asking a lot of guys, but I deserve better than what boys have provided so far. Maybe I can find a guy like this.

Shelle

I'm for sale

--------I'm for sale---------

Here's the rules of FACEBOX Adoption::

-Put in the subject "I'm for sale" and see who wants to own you.
the first guy or girl that replies and says that you are theirs owns you.
girls-have to pick a guy
guys- pick a girl
let's see who wants you...

Pictures-newish poem of mine

Scattered around her body,
all torn to shreds.
Broken glass all bloody,
thoughts rush though their heads.

How could she do this?
Just let it all go.
Because of a kiss?
She let her blood flow

Pictures of them together,
so happy and in love.
Now she is gone forever,
his one and only love.

We Thought Wrong-poem

You're gone now,
it's simple to see.
That I have forgotten
your memory.
We once laughed,
we once cried,
we once wrote
this lullaby.
We thought it would live
to see the day.
That we would be together,
not walking away.
You said you'd never leave me,
I guess you lied.
You set me free,
and we both cried.

Not Good Enough-lyrics

Just thinking of all the pain you caused
I didn't know I'd let it o that far
Didn't know you'd take my innocence away
Then throw me out the very next day
I didn't know I'd have to spend the rest of my life
Supporting something that wasn't even wanted by Christ

I gotta pay those bills, gotta watch that tv
Gotta wait for the check I've got since I was 17
Gotta take them to soccer games and movie scenes
Sometimes it just makes me want to scream

Starring at these marks, they just won't go away
Praying you were here to help me make it through the day
Avoiding their questions everytime I turn around
Just wanting to fall crying to the ground
Playing with babydolls to make her smile
Listening to his stories just makes it all worth while

Gotta pay those bills, gotta watch that tv
Gotta wait for the check I've got since I was 17
Gotta take them to soccer games and movie scenes
Sometimes it just makes me want to scream

I can't handle the pressure of "being mom"
But I get through the day, and life goes on
I get up every moring to take care of your kids
I look at their pictures when i can't make it though the day
I tell them about you when they want to know
They don't understand why you left, all I say
"Mommy wasn't good enough to make him stay"

Fresh Meat...

Ok sorry, but i'm new to this thingy and i have no clue about any of it. and my dear sweet sissy doesn't seem to be much help...no offense...so if anyone would help that would be very much appreciated.
MissSkace

boredness & alone

ok i'm bored
thinking about an ex
and how much i want him
nothing new there
care to persuade me
out of calling him back?

Skacie Kay

confused

i love him more than words can say...it hurts that he could cheat on me and think i wouldn't find out...why can't i move on even though i always try? am i that big of a loser? i just want the pain to go away...i'm the little girl that crys out in the night, but when you come around i always try to hide...any advice from the people who love me or anyone really...your favorite tinker whore...lol
Skacie Kay
Shelle

anthony clay

well i hung out with my ex anthony and his room mate last night...when his room mate went on a walk things got pretty hot and heavy, we didn't have sex, but we both wanted to. He ended up asking me back out last night and i told him not yet because i am still trying to find out what to do about everything...i sign on here today and i go to his page to leave a comment and his damn thing says he has a girl...and i feel like an idiot because i was going so far with him last night...i even asked himm if he had a girl and he said no...the thing is i love him with all my heart and he says he loves me but doesn't know what to do because of my mom...i don't know anymore...any advice would be nice...
Shelle
